alert.note: Alert for Bergen (New Jersey) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS New York City - Upton (Long Island and New York City)
info.headline: Flood Advisory issued September 11 at 6:00PM EDT by NWS New York City - Upton
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 PM EDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Minor stream flooding caused by earlier excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...Portions of northeast New Jersey, including the following county, Bergen. Portions of southeast New York, including the following county, Rockland. * WHEN...Until 900 PM EDT. * IMPACTS...River or stream flows are elevated. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 600 PM EDT, Gauge reports indicated heavy rain due to earlier thunderstorms. This will cause stream flooding. - This includes the following streams and drainages... Saddle River. - Some locations that could experience minor flooding include... Upper Saddle River, Saddle River, and Hohokus. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: River banks and culverts can become unstable and unsafe.
